This message was automatically generated.

Patch attached to return {{ApplicationResourceUsageReport}} with reserved memory as sum of all partitions.
Please review patch attached
All testcase failures are already handled as part of YARN-4478

[~rohithsharma]/[~Naganarasimha]
Could you please review patch attached.

Hi [~bibinchundatt]
Thanks for the patch. Generally looks good.

One nit which is not related to the patch. I think it can be handled along with this.

In {{FicaSchedulerApp#internalUnreserve}}, could you also please correct below mistake in log message.
{code}
+ "; currentReservation " + this.attemptResourceUsage.getReserved()
{code}
Pls change to {{getAllReserved() - getReserved(node.getPartition())}}.

Hi [~bibinchundatt],
Sorry to respond back late, 
IIUC reservation is currently only supported for Default label and not for other partitions. (refer AbstractCSQueue.canAssignToThisQueue & LeafQueue.canAssignToUser) I have raised a jira for it YARN-4588. Once we support reservation for other partitions we can address this issue until then it will not be applicable.
As corrected by [~sunilg], YARN-2695 already exists for supporting reservation in Other partitions
